description:
An army of scantily-clad Amazonian warriors want to investigate Luffy’s family jewels, but the captain of the Straw Hats is more interested in reuniting with his lost mates.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dépêche-toi de retrouver tes compagnons ! Aventure sur l`île des femmes
Hurry Back to Your Friends! The Maiden Island Adventure
Isoge! Nakama-tachi no Moto e: Nyougashima no Bouken
Скорее! Вернуться к команде – приключение на Острове женщин
أسرع إلى أصدقائك! مغامرة جزيرة النّساء
急げ! 仲間たちのもとへ 女ヶ島の冒険
